title: Skechers - Sneakers Review 1035527 Apr 17, Skechers Relaxed Fit Shoes

thread.title: Skechers - Sneakers Review 1035527 Apr 17, Skechers Relaxed Fit Shoes
thread.title_full: Skechers - Sneakers Review Review 1035527 Apr 17, Skechers Relaxed Fit Shoes @ Pissed Consumer
thread.section_title: Read complaints and reviews Page 91 @ Pissed Consumer

text:
I purchased some brown relaxed fit memory foam skechers last summer.I am a teacher and skechers have always been a good choice for me.
They are comfortable and wear well. This is my fourth pair of skechers. In about 3 months time of moderate use, a hole formed in the toe at the seam. This has never happened before.
I do not still have my receipt, and I cannot remember the price I paid. They were purchased at Famous Footwear in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. What is most exasperating for me is trying to find a Skechers address or phone number to report this faulty product.
I am not planning on purchasing anymore Skecher products.I cannot afford for them to be unwearable in three months time.
Review about: Skechers Relaxed Fit Shoes.
Review #1035527
